unittitle_ssm: Water Street Associates collection on the Fulton Ferry Landing proposal
abstract_ssm: This collection contains reproductions of architectural renderings, elevations, and plans created by the firm Water Street Associates for its proposal for the renewal of the Fulton Ferry Landing neighborhood in Brooklyn, N.Y.  Materials date from 1971.
